title: 阅读词汇补充
content:
bounty
land v. 登录到达
rhythmic
spawn
crash
severe

title: 大作文结构
content:
大作文类型：议论文/报告文/混合类
议论文：按照提问方式分类/3小类：
agree or or disagree (AD型）
题干给出一个明确的观点 我们的观点 可以同意/反对/部分同意、反对 ；从自身角度进行论述
首段：句子1：there is an argument that+改写题干观点
it is claimed/argued/suggested that+改写题干观点
句子2:同意：Personally, I tend to believe this idea reasonable/justified/logical
让步段：论述反方理由 It is true that/admittedly/on the one hand, by learning handwriting, can children well deal with some formal situations. To be more detailed/To elaborate with more details/To be more specific,…
支持段：论述持方理由 In spite of the above argumentation, considering that there can be more drawbacks, I would hold onto my position
支持段：论述持方理由
尾段：重述立场
In conclusion, I contend that ＋立场，because not only but also，though（DG型：sth has its possible LB和AD：sth has possible disadvantage/drawback/downside)
discuss both views and give your opinion (DG型）
题干给出两个观点 我们的观点可以是支持A、支持B、AB都有道理；讨论双方是指主体段分别论述两观点各自的理由；主体段先引述题干观点；尾段总结自己的观点
首段写作：
句子1:there exists a controversy over +两观点的争议
people have divergent views about +两观点的争议点
句子2:Personally, I tend to believe that+观点(回答争议点）
如何在双边讨论的情况下凸显个人立场？


在支持段段首亮明立场 并指出持方有更多优势 或弊端


驳斥：A）针对让步段的问题 提出解决办法
B）针对让步段的优势 提出质疑
尾段：


有侧重点的双边讨论：（重点）
In conclusion+重述立场（怎么问怎么答）+总结持方理由（内容和顺序与主体段一致）+让步反方理由


advantage/disadvantge/positive/negative/good/bad (LB型）
题干给出一个现象探讨整个现象的利弊；看清楚提问方式：利大于弊吗 利弊都必须写；积极还是消极的发展 可以利弊都写只写利或只写弊；看清楚限定范围（society/family/individual…)
报告文
给一个现象 分析该现象产生的原因  解决办法  带来的问题 2问结合
cause：名词/问原因；动词-引起、导致/问带来的问题
solution：措施针对题干现象的措施；针对第一问所引起问题的措施
混合类：组合考察报告文+议论文

title: 精听
content:
Tom could I ask  you for some advice please.
Yes,of course if you think I can help.What’s about.
It’s my first media studies assignment.I’m not sure how to go about it .You must have done last year.
Is that one comparing the coverage of particular story in the range of newspaper.
That’s right.
I really enjoyed wiriting it.
So,what sort of things i need (to) compare.
Well,there were several things.For example,there’s the question of which page of newspaper (the item appear on).
You mean,because there’s a big difference bewteen having it on fornt page and buttom of page ten ,(for instance)
Excatly,that show the how important ediotrs think the story is.
Then there is size how many color (column inches)the story is given,how many (colum) spreads over
I suppose that includes the headline.
It’s cretainly does.It’s all part of attracting the reader’s attention.
What about graphics whether there’s anything visual in addition to the text.
Yes,you need to consider those to,because they can have a big effect on reader’s understanding of the story,sometimes the a bigger effect than text itself.
Then you need to look at how the item put together,what structure is it given.
(Bear in mind)the not many people read beyond the first paragraph,so what the (has)journalist put the beginning.
If say they are conficting opinons about some things,does one appear in the end,where pepole probably won’t read.
But newspaper sometime give wrong or misleading information don’t it.
And newspaper sometime give wrong or misleading information don’t they.
Either deliberately or by accident.
Should I be looking at that
Yes,if you can.Compare what’s in different versions and (as far as)possilbetry to workout what’s true and what isn’t
And  that relates to a very important point,what’s the wirter the purpose or at least the most important one if they have several.
It may seem to be to inform the public.but often they want to create a (fear) or controversy,or to make somebody look ridiculois.
Gosh,I see what’s your mean.And I suppose to writer may make assumption about reader.
That’s right,about knowledge of subject,their altitudes and a level of education which means the writing so that these readers understand without feeling (patronised)
All of that make difference to how the story is presented

title: 听力错题
author: tong
content:
C14-Test 2-Section 1

9.错误原因：听到leg就直接旋律，没有将句子听完
1No not with my legs.I did have an accident last year,when I slipped and hurt my shoulder,that's better now
10.错误原因：apart from 意思不知道 vitamin发音不熟悉
1Well,I take vitamins but that's all I'm generally healthy.
C15-Test 1-Section 2

错误原因：对于pass不熟悉 n.出入证，通行证
1Day 4 is free for you to explore using the pass which we give you.
C15-Test 3-Section 3

错误原因：graphic
1What' s about graphic,whether there's anything visual in addition to the text.
C17-Test 4-Part 1

3.错误原因：shirts 发言不熟悉
1It wouldn't be much,just my shirts for work that week

6.错误原因:electrician 不认识 n.电工
1And the same thing if you need electrician.
C15-Test 2-Section 2


错误原因：没有听清楚lily pond
1Statue of Dinae Gosforth has been moved.It used to the south gate,bute it's now immediately to the  north of lily pond.almost the centre of park,which make it much visible.

错误原因：没有听清楚lily pond
1Something else i'd like mention is new fitness area.This is right next the lily pond on the same side of west gate.
C15-Test 4-Section 2


错误原因：内容没有听全，忽略“It’s a bit hideen of tree”这部分
1It by the the glass house just to the right of path from the south gate.You have to look for.It's a bit hideen of tree

错误原因：没有听清“south of playground”
1It's on the bend of in the path that go round the east side of lake just south of the adventure playgrond.
C17-Test 2-Section 2

错误原因：同义替换没有意识到 hardly ever fround=rare
12You'll see types of cattle and sheep that are hardly ever found on farms these days.
C17-Test 4-Section 2

错误原因：没有听清楚部分单词 scheme 导致没有听懂文章意思
1Their first step was to introduce a scheme for recognising talent amongst their employees.

错误原因:同义替换 cost of childcare =financial benefit
1To make life easier for staff, many of whom had childcare responsibilities, the hotel began issuing vouchers to help cover the cost of childcare.
C15-Test 1-Section 3

错误原因：对原文理解错误，把get on with their older or younger siblings理解成了是outgoing
1There isn’t such a clear picture from middle children. But one trait that a lot of these studies mention is that they are easier to get on with their older or younger siblings.

错误原因:没听清定位词,没找到答案句
1. A couple of studies mention that these children grow up more quickly and they are expected to do basic things for themselves like getting dressed.
C13-Test 4-Section 2

错误原因：fully mastered 没有听清 fully mastered= a lot of skill
1But if you've fully mastered the techniques needed for hills, it's great fun.
C15-Test 2-Section 2

错误原因：答案句判断错误 将答案句错当成“has been the responsibility of the city council for most of that time” 实际是
“Minster was some waste land. which people living nearby started planting with flowers in 1892” 此处能看出这个是一个公共区域
C18-Test 3-Section 2

错误原因：听到“a couple of days” 和“ after washing”对于答案句理解有误,
1They' ll be fine for a couple of days,but it's best to cook them as soon as possible after washing them very carefuly first of course
C18-Test 3-Section 2

错误原因：对于“can react badly”没有反应过来
1but just be aware can react badly to certain varieties so it's a good idea not eat huage quantities to begin with.
C10-Test 2-Section 2

错误原因：同义替换 only one of its kind in the world = unusual，seawater to be used=water treatment
1with up to the minute features such as a recycling system the only one of its kind in the world - which enables seawater to be used in the pool.
C14-Test 2-Section 2

错误原因：句型不熟悉
1rather than repair the guest rooms, they'd make a new house for her out of wood next to the main hall.
C16-Test 3-Section 2

错误原因：同义替换 don’t want to be stuck with a 40-hour week=the active lifestyle
1For a start, they often offer opportunities for those who don't want to be stuck with a 40-hour week
C16-Test 3-Section 2

错误原因：同义替换 being in a very quiet location=in pretty remote areas
1But if you like a lively city environment surrounded by lots of people, these jobs are probably not for you - they're often in pretty remote areas.
C13-Test 1-Section 1

错误原因：对于private发音不熟悉
1And could I get a private lesson there
C13-Test 1-Section 2


错误原因：没有意识到答案标志 “but”
1but we're going to change that,and allow parking there

错误原因：对于sign on 发音不熟悉
1There'll be a new ‘ No Parking ’ sign on School Road,just by the entrance to the school

错误原因：听到school 就直接选了，没有意识到后面的选项
1We think we can manage to get an extra half-metre on the bend just before you get to the school,on the same side of the road
C15-Test 1-Section 1

错误原因：isn’t so much 错听成了 is so much 将否定听成了肯定,没有意识到强调句 It was… that.
1What's important for that kind of job isn't so much having business skills or knowing lots of different computer systems.It was communication that really matters.
C17-Test 1-Section 3

错误原因：同义替换 deliver（分娩）=giving birth
12My farm was mostly livestock,especially sheep. I really enjoyed helping out with them. I was up most of one night helping a sheep deliver a lamb.
C14-Test 2-Section 3

错误原因：只听到了jawbones 但是实际内容与题目无关
1Well the mammoth bones previously found on the North American mainland were much less recent than that. So this was really amazing

错误原因：没用听出 warmed up 和 get cut off
1Then the climate warmed up and the sea level began to rise, and the island got cut off from the mainland.
C13-Test 4-Section 4

错误原因：political 不认识
1and many social movements and political developments had their origins in coffee house discussions.

错误原因: 错将ports听成 spot
1Different types of coffee were produced in different areas, and it's interesting that the names given to these different types,

错误原因：对题目理解错误，以为depend on 后填写的是具体设施
1In Brazil and the various Caribbean colonies, coffee was grown in huge plantations and the workers there were almost all slaves.
C11-Test 4-Section 4

错误原因：将hard听成hot
1In the 1970s and '80s, Lal was studying soils in Africa so devoid of organic matter that the ground had become extremely hard,

错误原因：moist这个词不熟悉
12This aims to boost the fertility of soil and keep it moist through established practices.

错误原因：cattle听到这个词了，但是对于词不熟悉没有联想到
C14-Test 4-Section 4

错误原因：marble不认识
12The site is the final resting place of an ancient Roman ship, which sank in the sixth century AD while ferrying prefabricated marble elements for the construction of an early church.

错误原因：定位错误 将 Wifi networks 当成定位和答案
12Instead, a more complex mix of technologies is required. For short distances, AUVs can share data using light while acoustic waves are used to communicate over long distances.

错误原因：同义替换 superior=better
1its position - with a nearby AUV that carries superior cameras, and arrange for that AUV to make a closer inspection of the object.

错误原因：同义替换supplies=goods
1When it sank, it was carrying medical goods, in wooden or tin receptacles.

错误原因：wine 的发音不熟悉
1Some were used for transporting cargoes of olive oil, and others held wine

be a coastal city located in the south of China,in hainan province because of its geo

title: 小作文句型
author: tong
content:
波动句型


Sth fluctuates /waves +幅度（slightly/dramatically） between 最小值 and 最大值 + 时间


Sth shows a fluctuant trend/tendency between … and … + 时间


There are + 幅度 fluctuations in + 主题 + 时间


Some fluctuations can be found/seen in + 主题 + 时间


起点


sth strats from /stands at /begin at + 数据 + 时间


sth is 数值 initially/at first


there be 人数等 initially/at frist


幅度
轻微的
adj: slight,marginal,insignificant
adv：slightly,marginally,insignificantly
平稳的
adj:moderate,gradual,steady
adv:moderately,gradually,steadily
大幅度的
adj:considerable,significant,rapid,substantial,marked,notable,exponential,radical,drammatic
adv:considerably,significantly,rapidly,substantially,markedly,notably,exponentially,radically , dramatically
上升


increase n/v 过去式： increased 过去分词： increased


rise n/v 过去式：rose 过去分词:rose


grow growth 过去式：grew 过去分词：grown


go up


上升句型


Sth rises + 幅度 + 数值描述 + 时间


There is/There emerges a 幅度 rise + 数值描述 + in sth + 时间


The period from…to…sees/undergo/witness/experience a/an + 幅度 + increase + 数值描述


shows an upward trend／tendency ＋ 时间


A 幅度 rise 数值描述 can be found in sth ＋时间


峰值

peak at+数值
reach the highest point at+数值
reach a maximum of+数值
hit the peak at +数值

稳定

remain stable/steady at+数值
show little change
stabilize at+数值
plateau at+数值

大约

about,around,approximately almost

(将近，稍低于)

just over,just under
slightly above,slightly below
a little more than,a little less than

下降

decrease n/v
drop n/v dropped
fall n/v fell fallen
decline n/v declined
dip n/v dipped
diminish v diminished

谷值

bottom out at+数值
reach the lowest point at +数值
reach a minimum of+数值
Reach its bottom at +数值

终点

Sth rises/sth falls to+数值
sth rises/falls back to the initial figure
end at

相反：however/by contrast/an opposite trend can be found in sth
相似：similarly/likewise/sth was in the same pattern with sth
其他：meanwhile/during the same period
第一名

important main primary principal significant
popular popularity attract
比较级表最高级

第二名

another + 重要的
also

最后一名

insignificant/unimportant。。。
only merely just
比较级表最高级 individually separately respectively

连接词

Following this peak
In terms of 关于\

到达

reach

title: 听力笔记
author: tong
content:
填空题做题步骤：
1.字限
2.标题
3.定位词（填空题本行，比较独特的名词。也可能在上一行结尾)
4.寻找填空前后各两个实词并且预判同替+判断填空的词性和词类
14T2S1P32
1特殊修饰语出现
·形容词、副词出现，一定给出陷阱和答案。
2空前/后紧挨的动词替换
空前后紧挨着的词，尤其是动词、形容词容易替换。
·近义词替换
make A from B =make A out of B
·词性转换
the organiser’s blog the organiser is keeping a blog
·主被动的转换
A map is provided=They 'll give you a map
3答案在问句中
·答案词出现在提问者的问题之中或者被代词指代。
I suppose/I presume/I assume/I guess…?Yes.

title: 写作笔记
author: tong
content:
第一次写作课：
小作文类型：
1）动态图：有时间变化（有2个或更多时间）=线图
内容：趋势+比较大小
2）静态图：无时间变化（有1个时间/未给出时间）=单饼
内容：比较大小
3）地图
4）流程图
小作文评分标准：TA&CC：小作文内容要求+逻辑安排
清晰的概括：
A）数据主要趋势：
overall, the chicken consumption experienced the only rise, accompanied by/compared to a decrease in that of beef, lamb and fish.
overall, China underwent the only decline in the number of applications, accompanied by a rise in that of the USA and Japan and some moderate waves in that of Russia.
B) 数据大小比较：最大值、最小值/参考终点决定
Besides, it was the USA that became the country with the most applications from 2006 while Russia always sent the fewest applications.
C) 某个特殊阶段：流程图/动态图：该时间段内 所有数据趋势相似或大小相近 大多数图表没有这个信息
重要值：
A）起点/终点
B）峰值/谷值：用文字强调出来
C）交点：在该时间点 两数据大小发生转折 尤其指最大值发生变化 重点；两数据在该时间点相等；与后来居上的数据写在一起；先把后来居上的数据整条线趋势写完 然后强调交点
there was a marked rise from 12,000 in 2004 to 28,000  in 2008 in the figure for the USA’s applications, which surpassed that of China in 2006.
the same period witnessed a relatively slight increase from 8,000 to 15, 000 in the quantity of Japan’s applications, with the number reaching the same point with that of China in 2007.
D) 最大值、次大值、最小值（图中数据较多的时候 有取有舍 有详有略）
相关的地方做比较：数据的趋势和大小的相似、差异较大之处
A）体现在主体段分段上：只用一套标准分段
B）体现在每个主体段的中心句上：发现的数据对比关系/分段思路
C）体现在不同段落和不同数据之间的衔接关系上
相反：however/by contrast/an opposite trend can be found in sth
相似：similarly/likewise/sth was in the same pattern with sth
其他：meanwhile/during the same period
主体段1:the whole period witnessed the only sustainable decrease in the number of China’s applications.
主体段2: However, both the USA and Japan saw a rise in the figure for their applications. Specifically, the USA…Similarly, Japan,…
主体段3:By contrast, some marginal fluctuations can be found in the quantity of Russia’s applications.
强调数据特征：
A）起点高但终点低/起点低但终点高（数据起点的极值信息）
at first, China sent much more applications than other countries, 27,000.
B) 数据的变化幅度最大或最小
sth experienced the most notable/the least notable change.
C) 数据之间的差距变大或变小
the gap between the three was widened/narrowed.
小作文框架：
首段：改写题目
主体段：2-3个主体段
尾段：概括图表信息：数据主要趋势+最大值、最小值/参考终点决定（+某个特殊阶段）
主体段1:The whole period witnessed the only sustainable decrease in the number of China’s applications.At first, it sent much more applications than other countries, 27,000， but the figure ended at only 10,000.
主体段2: However, both the USA and Japan saw a rise in the figure for their applications. Specifically, there was a marked rise from 12,000 in 2004 to 28,000 in 2008 in the figure for the USA’s applications, which surpassed that of China in 2006. Similarly, the same period witnessed a relatively slight increase from 8,000 to 15, 000 in the quantity of Japan’s applications, with the number reaching the same point with that of China in 2007.
主体段3:By contrast, some marginal fluctuations can be found in the quantity of Russia’s applications, which decreased slowly from 6,000 to the minimum of 5,000 over the first two years before a climb to the maximum of 7,000 in 2007 and a drop back to the initial figure at last.
尾段：overall, China underwent the only decline in the number of applications, accompanied by a rise in that of the USA and Japan and some moderate waves in that of Russia.Besides, it was the USA that became the country with the most applications from 2006 while Russia always sent the fewest applications.
小作文审题：
1）审题干：找描述对象
2）审小标题：找描述对象
3）审横纵坐标：找描述对象/时间/单位/题干补充信息
4）时间：动静态图/时态
过去+将来：1）中心句时态：一般现在式
2）尾段概括：趋势概括 一般现在式/最大值/最小值 一般将来
3）细节部分：根据具体情况决定时态
5)单位：million/billion/quadrillion/trillion/thousand 复数不加s/不能省略
ton/unit/minute/dollar 复数加s/可以适当做省略
rose from 6 million to the peak at 9 million tons
小作文首段写作：改写题目
题目结构：图表名称+展示动词+主题+区域+时间
The given table presents the proportion of consumer expense on three different types of items in five nations in 2002.
动态图：线图
1）描述顺序：
A）从高到低：参考起点决定
B）从左到右：按照时间发展顺序 从起点写到终点
2)单线写作：
A)句式变化：there be句型/时间见证者/被动态/主谓结构/国家见证
B)单线写作衔接词的变化：
3)多线写作：3线或以上：搞定主体段分段
A)按照数据大小（当数据的大小对比关系界限分明的时候）
B)按照数据趋势
C)按照数据变化幅度（按照数据大小和趋势不具备区分度的时候

title: 阅读错题整理
author: tong
content:
C18-Test2

题干翻译：有能力做出道德决定的机器可能会阻碍我们促进我们社区的利益。
答案句：We might lose our freedom to discriminate in favour of our own communities
生词： discriminate v.
区分，辨别；歧视，区别对待

24 错误原因：没有注意到currently 这个限定，只找了role这个定位，导致定位错误
25,26 错误原因：由于上面的定位错误，25的正确选项已经被选中，导致下面两问找不到答案

错误原因：答案句子没有看完
答案句： Following a typical Renaissance trend, he began to work on an ‘ideal city’ project, which - due to its excessive costs - would remain unfulfille

错误原因：错将 prominent Renaissance men  当成local people 没有注意prominent限定
答案句：when prominent Renaissance men pushed forward large-scale urban projects in Italy, such as the reconfiguration of the town of Pienza and the expansion of the city of Ferrara.

title: 阅读笔记
author: tong
content:
主语从句（强调句）
I met Xiao Hong at the railway station yesterday.
强调主语：It was I that(who)met Xiao Hong at the railway station yesterday.
强调宾语：It was Xiao Hong that I met at the railway station yesterday.
强调地点状语：It was at the railway station that I met Xiao Hong yesterday.
强调时间状语：It was yesterday that I met Xiao Hong at the railway station.

句子填空
1.明确字数要求
2.精读题目，空格分析(词性，是否可数，单复数；含义)
3.划定位词(特殊词，名词，逻辑词，空格所在短语)
4.定位答案段（特殊词）-定位答案句(名词，逻辑词)-定位答案词（空格所在短语）
5.原文原词填空（符合字数要求范围内尽量多填词）

完成句子题
1.审题干，划分定位词
2.读选项，划限定词（定语，状语，动宾短语）：
3.定位答案段，定位答案句子，定位答案意群：
4.逐个选项，跟原文对照，同义替换（原文原词可能是坑）
完成句子vs句子填空
共性：细节；有序
差异；同义替换；结合排除法作图
summary填空
填词类Summary
解题步骤：
1.明确字数要求
2.精读所有题目(注意代词，特指&逻辑词)，空格分析
3.划定位词（上下文协助定位）；
4.定位答案段-定位答案句–定位答案词；
5.原文原词填空
选词类Summary
解题步骤：
1.明确题目要求NB（几乎是一个选项填两次）:
2.分析选项，词性归类；
3.精读所有题目(注意代词，特指&逻辑词)，空格分析：
4.划定位词（上下文协助定位）
5.定位答案段–定位答案句-定位答案词；
子答案词和Word bank.进行对比，注意同义替换或词性转变：
判断题
判断逻辑
把题目考点转换成一般疑问句；
根据原文答案所在句，对一般疑问句回答；
如果答案：yes(YES/TRUE):
如果答案：noNO/FALSE);
如果答案：sory,Idon’t know.NOT GIVEN);
解题步骤
1.审题，判断TRUE/YES,圈出来；
2精读题目，定位词（优先找主语）；考点词（需要对的关键信息）
3带着定位词，去文章定位出题句（所有定位词同替）
4精读定位出题句，判断考点，确定答案
Notice:可能连着两个题目答案为NOT GIVEN,同时带着三道题目同时定位；
判断题tips:
5答案的选择具有一定的规律：
A.题目数目在3个时，则可能无NG,但是TF一定存在题目数目在4-7个时，三种答案都要出现，NG一般不超过两个题目数量在7个以上时，可能有3个NG
B.可以连续三个题的答案一样，但是没有连续四个题答案还是一样的
6 NOT GIVEN不好判断的时候，可以先把这个题放下，做完前后的题目以后再判断
7 如果只出现了3个题并且在文章的最后一个题型可能覆盖面大，距离远

三个题一起做。
判断＋填空（交叉出题）平行阅读法
判断（3）
填空（1）

title: My First blog
author: tong
content: 第一篇博客尝试，也不知道能不成功

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick Start
Create a new post
1$ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing
Run server
1$ hexo server
More info: Server
Generate static files
1$ hexo generate
More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites
1$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment
